name: Guatemala Clicker
description:
ENG-  Discover the wonderful culture of Guatemala by playing Guatemala Clicker! Earn quetzales, learn interesting facts about the country, and buy representative items. This game is available in both English and Spanish.

ESP- ¡Descubre la maravillosa cultura de Guatemala jugando Guatemala Clicker! Gana quetzales, aprende datos curiosos sobre el país y compra cosas representativas. Este juego esta disponible en Ingles y Español.
